## PuzzleSession.cellIsValid() method

Determines if a cell is valid.

**Signature:**

```typescript
cellIsValid(spec: string | IRowColumn | ICell): boolean;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

spec


</td><td>

string \| [IRowColumn](./ts-sudoku-lib.irowcolumn.md) \| [ICell](./ts-sudoku-lib.icell.md)


</td><td>

A `string` ([CellId](./ts-sudoku-lib.cellid.md)<!-- -->), [RowColumn](./ts-sudoku-lib.irowcolumn.md) or [ICell](./ts-sudoku-lib.icell.md) describing the cell to be tested.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

`true` if the cell value is valid, `false` if the cell value or the cell itself is invalid.
